pr_title: Mock Version.js to avoid failing snaphot tests after version change

timeline.message: Update WidgetQueryControls snapshot regarding changed docs url
Mock Version.js to avoid failing snapshot tests after version change

timeline.bodyText: Could we use something more obviously mocked than 1.0?
timeline.author: kyleknighted
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -182,7 +182,7 @@ exports[`WidgetQueryControls should do something 1`] = `
         class="pull-right search-help"
       >
         <a
-          href="http://docs.graylog.org/en/3.2/pages/queries.html"
+          href="http://docs.graylog.org/en/1.0/pages/queries.html"

replies.bodyText: Also, let's adjust the path to use https and not http.
replies.author: kyleknighted

replies.bodyText:
Changed it to more obvious mock content.
I will create another PR for the https change, I know it's small change and I will have to rebase the PR, but I just don't want to mix the changes.
replies.author: linuspahl

timeline.message: Define version mock content which is more obvious a mock
